params.groupSql: select distinct g.id, g.parentId, g.name as name, g.description from xxx_group g where g.id >= :groupId
params.userSql: select distinct u.id, u.groupId, u.loginName, '111111' as password, u.userName, u.email, u.sex, u.birthday, u.employeeNo, null authMethod, u.disabled from xxx_user u where u.groupId >= :groupId
